mapper.select: SELECT b.uuid as passportFileUuid, b.ext as passportFileExt, b.orig_name as passportFileOrigName, b.year as passportFileYear, b.month as passportFileMonth, b.day as passportFileDay FROM student a LEFT JOIN files b ON a.passport_file_idx = b.idx WHERE a.student_id = #{studentId} AND a.idx = #{studentIdx}
